FuncDef: This parameter limits the number of inbound Telnet and SSH sessions. A maximum of 30 telnet and ssh connections can be established to the router. The local serial port cannot be disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
The maximum number of concurrent inbound Telnet sessions, expressed as an integer. Values-0 to 50 (default = 5) 
or 0 to N where N is the new total number of SSH+Telent sessions if they are scaled.
